attributes.action: allow the electorate to directly elect the Prime Minister and members of the cabinet.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The time has come for the Prime minister and members of the cabinet to be directly elected for a fixed term of 4 years.  In addition, they should be selected based on ability and experiance rather than party affiliation, as this could improver co-operation between political parties, as well as increasing the possibility of the jobs being done by someone with direct experience - a qualified accountant as chancdellor, a former member of the armed services af Defence Secratary etc.
